title: Lab Manual
text:
This area is for lab members only.
If you are interested in our work, join us by clicking here.

title: Quantitative Histories Workshop
text: we quantify history and the social sciences to learn about in/justice & futurity.

title: Lesson 1
text:
To explore this model, we will use a case study.
Our case study begins with the Washington Post Fatal Force database. Throughout the case study, historical and other contemporary data is combined to generate an original database. This database can be used for your analysis.

title: Our Work
text: We quantify history and the social sciences to learn about in/justice & futurity.

title: Our Work
text:
QUANT SHOP DATA
Our lab works to identify sources of information for engagement and analyses across historical, contemporary, and future-oriented perspectives. These data are meant to support critical quantitative analyses.
Data sources, software programs, and code are outlined below.
